channel.title: Error when i try to make random drops
channel.description: i am new to random drops and i tried got an error when compiling NPCHandler.java:628: cannot find symbol symbol : method randomrat() location: class Item2 ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomrat(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, Ge tNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

item.description:

i am new to random drops and i tried got an error when compiling

symbol : method randomrat()
location: class Item2
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomrat(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, Ge
tNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
